  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, Drawer, TabSwitchedListener

    public class AltTransitionTool
extends AbstractTransitionTool<AltAutomaton>
    A AltTransitionTool is a tool for creating transitions in an alternating automaton.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:

        Description copied from class: AbstractTransitionTool

      • isLabelRequired

        protected boolean isLabelRequired(State f,
                                  State t)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTransitionTool
        Returns true if a label is required for a transition from state f to state t. By default, a label is required if the label of the automaton is on transitions.

        isLabelRequired in class AbstractTransitionTool<AltAutomaton>
